snippet.title: Lords of Magic: Legends of Urak - Fire
snippet.description:
When things get out of control relax and autocalc

This game is a Mix of TBS and RTS, very similar to lords of the realm 2, but instead of city management, we only control a single lord and his champions/minions, it is necessary to pay for the training of a unit, also an upkeep, so occupying mines and cities will provide resources to help to reach our goal.

Lords of magic was developed by Impressions Games and published by Sierra Entertainment.
